name: Paw's Date
description: ​Paw's date is an app developed by a group of pet lovers who enjoy making new friends and would like to extend the same opportunity to their pets. Create and account, add a little description about your pet, upload a profile picture and start matching! Plus benefit: Great memory for the dog name but never remember the owner's? Use the app to remind yourself.​

name: Taco `Bout It
description: ​With this app your able to search a restaurants and be able to make a review regarding whether or not the restaurant is following Covid rules. this app is designed to help fellow food eaters know what restaurants to eat from.​

name: Workout Tracker
description: App designed to help you keep track of workouts and data collected over time.

name: Burger
description: A simple app to utilize front end and backend to create and update input by adding burgers you would like to eat and 'devouring them'.

name: Budget Tracker
description: A simple app to help keep track of expenses that uses Progressive Web Application technology to update and track transactions online and offline.

name: Weather Tracker
description: To create a simple weather app to give weather data in real time and a simple 5 day forecast using the Open Weather API

name: Introversion
description: Introversion is an app that helps introverts navigate awkward social environments. This app will generate jokes and news that will allow the user to engage in dreadful small talk.
